item.title: Setting up a data-playground with docker-compose and Faker
item.description: Setting up a data-playground with docker-compose and Faker In the past few days I played around with Airflow to get familiar with its DAG syntax. Instead of scrambling around to find the right dataset to be imported in a MySQL instance I’ve decided to set-up a development environment from scratch that allowed me to quickly change the structure and type of data as I pleased. I’ve found this approach quite handy for three reasons:
